reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be well-made with solid seams and appreciate its classic style that looks expensive. The fit is perfect, with one customer noting it sits right at the collar bones, and they like its heavier weight and good material quality. The color red receives positive feedback, and one customer mentions it can be worn to any business meeting. Opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it tr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, true red color in a mid to heavy weight yarn.
items.body: This lady jacket cardigan is beautiful. Color is true red with gold buttons. It is very similar to Talbot's, J. Crew, or Anthropologie at a fraction of the cost. Knit is tight and holds its shape with the help of solid seams, reinforced hems, and a placard behind the buttons to add stability and strength. The small shoulder pads give the sweater a blazer/jacket feel but could be easily removed. Golden buttons are sized well to the piece - not overpowering and not gawdy. Tightly sewn on, they do not droop or pull - no need to add stabilizing buttons behind the originals. This is a cropped piece, but not overly so. It sits a little below the waist of a high waist jean, just as shown in the picture. This is a versatile piece for a smart casual outfit. Wear it with a pair of jeans for an upscale casual look, add a pair of well fitted trousers for a polished look, or wear it like a blazer over a dress or skirt and blouse combo. Cardi fits true to size for the design; it is a fitted style. I am 5'1" and 100lbs with a 32DDD chest, 25 waist. I bought the XS and it hits my shoulder points perfectly. The sleeves are just past my wrist onto my hand, which I appreciate. Sleeves are fitted but not tight. Cardi has a high crew neck that sits right at the collar bones. If you like a looser fit, you may want to size up one size, but I recommend you wear it as it is designed. It's a super cute look! It is a warm, heavier piece! If you run hot, experience serious hot flashes, or live in an area that doesn't see temps below 50, this may be too heavy for your comfort. (Would be great for really cold A/C offices, though.) Right now, it is still 25 degrees where I live a week before Easter, so it will get a little use the next few weeks, but I really bought it for next fall. The cardi could be safely worn by itself due to the number of buttons that keep the sweater closed. Buy the correct size based on your measurements, and the sweater will not pull or gape across the chest. The lady jacket can also be layered with a tee, turtle neck or tank. There is a slight bit of a boxy fit as expected of a lady jacket - it is the intended look!! But it isn't overly boxy and flatters the wearer's frame. Do yourself a favor and find your seasonal color palette with an app or website. Getting the right color sweater for your season palette will go a long way in elevating your style and how you feel when wearing your new sweater (or any of your clothing!) I am a cool (classic) winter and this red is perfect for me. Read more
items.author: M Lane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: This sweater is shockingly great quality. I am impressed. It is thick and soft, and the color is beautiful. I found that it runs small though. I'm generally a medium across the board (140lbs, 5'6"), but the medium was quite tight. I sized up to a large and it fits perfectly. I only wish they had it in more colors! Read more
items.author: Irene Z.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Try it you might like
items.body: Nice quality. True to size. Nice fit. Color red is good Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice but the Poppy glows in the dark
items.body: Beautiful sweater. Well made, nice tight knit, shoulder pads for structure, classy style. For me the Poppy glows in the dark. I would have loved it in the two tone. Read more
items.author: Katrina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Essentials Red Jacket with Gold Buttons
items.body: This red jacket is made from thick fabric & it looks really nice & fits well. Gold buttons are giving a nice touch. Can be worn to any business meeting or casual event. Read more
items.author: Anjali Nagjee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, but too cropped for me
items.body: This was cute, but ultimately I sent it back. Why? Well.. because I'm nearing 40 and need a whole sweater, not a half. Also, I'm 5'4" and the arms were a bit long. If it hadn't been so cropped (which I somehow didn't notice in the pics) I would have kept it. Material is good, nice heavy cotton. Stitching was also good, and the gold buttons were so cute! Read more
items.author: Montana Family

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Heavy feel, great quality, unfortunately mine came with a stain so I had to return. Priced well around $40. Read more
items.author: H.A.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Sweater
items.body: This is adorable. Looks very expensive and I got a ton of compliments when I wore it Read more
items.author: Gayle Grego

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Eggshell White, Bright Poppy Red, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
